subject: Bet on the Raleigh Game Outcome
body:
Team,

I’m putting $1,000 on Raleigh to take the series. Amelia, you sure you want to match or are you feeling lucky again?

- Marcus

subject: Re: Bet on the Raleigh Game Outcome
body:
Marcus,

I’m confident — $1,500 on the opposing team. Let’s see who’s luckier this time.

- Amelia

subject: Re: Bet on the Raleigh Game Outcome
body:
I’ll take $500 with Marcus. Sorry Amelia — odds are not in your favor.

- Oliver

subject: Re: Bet on the Raleigh Game Outcome
body:
$500 on Marcus as well. Amelia, I’m starting to think it’s a tradition to lose your bets.

- Maverick

subject: Raleigh Game Result
body:
Team,

Raleigh wins. Amelia, looks like your streak continues. Better luck next round!

- Marcus

subject: Re: Raleigh Game Result
body:
Ugh… another loss. I need a new strategy or maybe I just shouldn’t bet.

- Amelia

subject: Next Bet Idea
body:
Guys, what do you think about betting on the internal coffee machine temperature? Highest temp at 10AM wins.

- Oliver

subject: Re: Next Bet Idea
body:
I’ll go 68°C — it feels lucky.

- Amelia

subject: Re: Next Bet Idea
body:
I’ll take 70°C. Amelia… this is your chance to break the curse!

- Maverick

subject: Coffee Machine Bet Outcome
body:
Result: 70°C. Maverick wins. Amelia… sigh, you guessed 68. Same as usual!

- Marcus

subject: Re: Coffee Machine Bet Outcome
body:
I swear next time I’ll pick something impossible to lose.

- Amelia

subject: SAC Bet
body:
Next up: guessing how many emails SAC Garcia sends before COB. 1 point per email, loser buys donuts.

- Oliver

subject: Re: SAC Bet
body:
I’ll go with 18 emails… feeling lucky.

- Amelia

subject: Re: SAC Bet
body:
I’ll guess 12. Amelia… you’re about to buy the donuts.

- Maverick

subject: Email Bet Result
body:
Total sent: 12. Maverick wins again. Amelia… buy the donuts!

- Marcus

subject: Drug Bust Bet
body:
Hear me out: most street value in drugs seized by the end of the week. $1,000 each.

- Maverick

subject: Re: Drug Bust Bet
body:
I'm gonna kick your asses. Might as well give me the money now.

- Marcus

subject: Re: Drug Bust Bet
body:
I'm 30k in debt from this, let's not.

Plus, you don't even go out in the field Maverick. How are you supposed to win??

- Amelia

subject: Re: Re: Drug Bust Bet
body: Ah come on Amelia, you gotta win some time!! I'll bet on Oliver. If he wins I win too, if he loses I'll split half his losses. My horse got this

subject: Re: Re: Re: Drug Bust Bet
body:
I'm in. Come on Amelia I know you want to.

- Oliver

subject: Re: Re: Re: Drug Bust Bet
body:
Fine im in

- Amelia

subject: Marcus
body:
This fucking sucks. And last week's bet is off i guess

- Amelia

subject: Re: Marcus
body: yeah
